Text: is it a guy nudist or a hot woman nudist?

I think I've seen this before. It's a BBC documentary following a 19 or 20 year old female who group up in a Nudist environment, but was not comfortable with her body. A bit overweight. She travels to different Nudist resorts and such and shows what it's like.

It's very boring...no activity,only speak alltime and we see alltime nude guys speaking except at the end,we see 1 woman nude (the teenager)and its only 10 secondes.  IT'S ONLY GOOD FOR PEOPPLE WANTING BECOME NATURIST...
It's not porn, it's a documentary, so it's beside the point, but just for the record there certainly are attractive people in it, and there are brief scenes of nude women throughout.
